definitions.definition: Characterized by major progress or overcoming some obstacle.
Involving the contraction of a disease by a person with a decreased susceptibility , such as a person who has been vaccinated to help prevent that disease.

main_definition: Characterized by major progress or overcoming some obstacle.
secondary_definitions: ( immunology ) Involving the contraction of a disease by a person with a decreased susceptibility , such as a person who has been vaccinated to help prevent that disease.
